sqlMap.statement: SELECT MDSE_CD ,THIS_MTH_FOB_AMT ,THIS_MTH_INTL_FRT_AMT ,THIS_MTH_INS_AMT ,THIS_MTH_IMPT_DTY_AMT ,THIS_MTH_INLND_FRT_AMT FROM MDSE WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MDSE_CD = #mdseCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = 0

SELECT MDSE_CHRG_DEF_RATE_CD ,MDSE_CHRG_DEF_RATE_NM ,INS_RATE ,INTL_FRT_RATE ,DTY_RATE ,INLND_FRT_RATE FROM MDSE_CHRG_DEF_RATE WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MDSE_CHRG_DEF_RATE_CD = #mdseChrgDefRateCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = 0
